title: hardware
description: a hardware subsystem part of the infrastructure running the computing task

$$key.description: the type of this subsystem part of your infrastructure, example: cpu, gpu

nb_component.description: the number of this item in your infrastructure

manufacturer.description: the name of the manufacturer, example: NVIDIA

family.description: the family of this component, example: GeForce

series.description: the series of this component, example: RTX 4080

share.description: the percentage of use of this component

quality.description: the quality of the information you provided, 3 possibilities : high (percentage error +/-1%), medium (percentage error +/-10%), low (percentage error +/-20%)
